TopicTitle: [Post Release Idea] Kerbal Space Program: Jebediah Edition Collector's Set

Articles.Content:
Note: I'm not ENTIRELY serious . This has a lot of predictions about the future, none of them serious.

It'd be cool if, after release, you could purchase a boxed set of Kerbal Space Program for a higher price. ($40-$60?)

It would include the following:

Kerbal Space Program version 1.0.0

Making of Kerbal Space Program documentary

Kerbals and Spaceflight documentary (A story about how KSP has influenced real life, and how real life influenced it)

Kerbal Space Program version 0.7.3

Kerbal Space Program version 0.10.2

Kerbal Space Program version 0.13.3

Kerbal Space Program version 0.15.0

KSP v.0.17.1

KSP v.0.18.4

KSP v.0.21.2

KSP v.0.22.2

KSP v.0.25.x

...and every major update or the update that rounded the previous one out. (0.15 instead of 0.14, 0.25 instead of 0.24, etc.)

Kerbal Jebediah Figure (3D printed plastic? Or by then will enough people like the game for injection-molded plastic to be used? Maybe even make him a USB thumbdrive that houses all of the digital stuff in it! Might cut down cost a bit, and DVDs/CDs are becoming obsolete on many computers.)

Kerbal Space Program tutorial Manual.

KSP Soccer Balls (and any other Squad-made mods)

And finally, any expansion packs that have already been made by the time.

What do you think? I think I might E-mail this to my future self using FutureMe.org in a year. If the game's still not 1.0.0, I'll Email it another time to the future.
I really like it, but I don't think, that 1.0.0 will released soon
Instead of a 3D Jeb figurine why not a random Kerbal? Engineer, scientist, Werner, generic and a 1 in X chance you actually get and orange suited Jeb, Bill or Bob.
It should also include an LV-N Atomic cigarette lighter. Because fire good!

every major update or the update that rounded the previous one out. (0.15 instead of 0.14, 0.25 instead of 0.24, etc.)

rounding the version numbers would mean getting 0.24.0 instead of 0.23.5 and we would get 0.25.0 instead of 0.24.2.

I`m not sure this would lead to the most stable versions being included.

i`d rather get the highest version within a major update (0.23.5, 0.24.2 etc)

On the topic of a figurine I`d not want a random one at all.

I want Jeb.

I'd be happy to kick a few dollars the developers way.

A Jeb USB stick inside a Papercraft Rocket sure would be a nice way to do that.

Or Bob in a spaceplane and Bill in Mun lander.
